parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the GBR registration is getting successful after filling the mandatory fields alone in the registration page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the user can able to do successful registration on submitting maximum number of characters in all the fields of the GBR registration page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the user can able to enter more than the maximum number of characters in all the fields of the GBR registration page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the registration is getting success while filling the optional fields alone in the GBR registration page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify valid alert message "Restricted Email ID" is displayed on giving mail id configured in RESTRICTED_MAIL_IDS tag and keeping RESTRICTED_MAIL_ID_CHECK tag value as "false" in GBR registration page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify valid alert message "Restricted Email ID" is displayed on giving mail id configured in RESTRICTED_MAIL_IDS tag and keeping RESTRICTED_MAIL_ID_CHECK tag value as "false" in GBR Edit registration page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether we can able to transfer the balance successfully from one subscriber to other subscriber for SIM LOST in the CRM application via admin as the user.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether we can able to transfer the balance successfully from one subscriber to other subscriber for SIM DAMAGED in the CRM application via admin as the user.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether we can able to transfer the balance successfully from one subscriber to other subscriber for OTHER in the CRM application via admin as the user.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the alert message "Highlighted Fields are Mandatory" is displayed in the front end and the mandatory fields are highlighted while clicking on approve button without submitting the mandatory fields in the balance transfer page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the entered details are refreshed after clickon reset button in the balance transfer page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the submitted balance transfer for SIM LOST request via agent login is displayed in the pending approvals page(admin login).

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the submitted the balance transfer for SIM DAMAGED request via agent login is displayed in the pending approvals page(admin login).

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the submitted the balance transfer for OTHER request via agent login is displayed in the pending approvals page(admin login).

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether we can able to reject the balance transfer request successfully for SIM LOST in the pending approvals page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether we can able to reject the balance transfer request successfully for SIM DAMAGED in the pending approvals page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether we can able to reject the balance transfer request successfully for OTHERS in the pending approvals page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the valid alert message "Highlighted Fields are Mandatory" is displayed in the frontend while clickon apply button without selecting the mandatory fields.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the valid alert message "Invalid serial number : 12" is displayed in the frontend while submitting the invalid serial number in the voucher status page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the valid alert message "Invalid voucher pin : 45" is displayed in the frontend while submitting the invalid serial number in the voucher status page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the enter details are refreshed after selecting reset button in the voucher status page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the valid voucher details are retrieved and displayed in the voucher status page while submitting the valid serial number.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the valid voucher details are retrieved and displayed in the voucher status page while submitting the valid voucher pin.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the serial number field allows numerals to enter in the voucher status page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the voucher pin field allows numerals to enter in the voucher status page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the evoucherid field allows numerals to enter in the voucher status page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the serial number field allows alphabets and special characters to enter in the voucher status page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the evoucherid field allows alphabets and special characters to enter in the voucher status page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the recharge date and used msisdn is getting displayed in the front end after submitting the valid serial number of the normal voucher in the voucher status page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the recharge date,used MSISDN and offers (On net minutes, sms, MTonnet mins, sms, MToffnet mins, sms,zones mins and sms) is getting displayed in the front end after submitting the valid voucher pin of the bundle mapped voucher in the voucher status page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify valid alert `Swap IMSI Updated successfully` alert is displayed on successful SWAP IMSI request in GBR Swap IMSI page through CS agent on keeping Enable_PAN tag value as `1`.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify valid alert message is displayed in GBR Swap IMSI page through CS agent on keeping IsCIPMandatory tag value as `1`, CIP_MinLength tag value as `4` and CIP_MaxLength tag value as `8`.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify valid alert message is displayed in GBR Swap IMSI page through CS agent on keeping IsCIPMandatory tag value as `1`, PAN_MinLength tag value as `4` and PAN_MaxLength tag value as `8`.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether all the records in the table TrnDebit for the msisdn are fetched and displayed based on the selected date on searching with status as `ALL` and Type as Debit and the sub-grid with detailed info of that transactions gets displayed on clicking the hyperlinked Trans Id in the Billing Transaction page of the CRM application.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether all the Pending records in the table TrnDebit for the msisdn are fetched and displayed based on the selected date on searching with status as `View Pending` and Type as Debit and the sub-grid with detailed info of that transactions gets displayed on clicking the hyperlinked Trans Id in the Billing Transaction page of the CRM application.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether all the Authorized records in the table TrnDebit for the msisdn are fetched and displayed based on the selected date on searching with status as `View Authorized` and Type as Debit and the sub-grid with detailed info of that transactions gets displayed on clicking the hyperlinked Trans Id in the Billing Transaction page of the CRM application.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether all the Rejected records in the table TrnDebit for the msisdn are fetched and displayed based on the selected date on searching with status as `View Rejected` and Type as Debit and the sub-grid with detailed info of that transactions gets displayed on clicking the hyperlinked Trans Id in the Billing Transaction page of the CRM application.
